item.title: Landing Page Example
item.description: Landing Page Example This theme offers a simple landing page layout which consist of three parts: header, body and footer, the body is the content itself. How to Use it? Specify the layout as landing on the front matter. TOML YAML JSON 1layout = 'landing' 1layout: landing 1{ 2 "layout": "landing" 3} And then writing the content with Markdown and shortcodes.
